sections.title: Swordlord (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Swordlord class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Deft Strike (Ex) (Swordlord)
sections.description: Allows adding Dexterity bonus instead of Strength bonus to damage rolls with dueling sword. Cannot be used with shield or off-hand weapon.

sections.title: Quick Draw (Swordlord)
sections.description: Grants Quick Draw as bonus feat, or Dueling Mastery if already possessed, or any Combat feat if both are known. Prerequisites must be met for selected feat.

sections.title: Display Weapon Prowess (Ex) (Swordlord)
sections.description: Adds half class level bonus to Intimidate checks when using Dazzling Display with dueling sword, plus bonuses for weapon feats. Grants bonuses to performance combat and dueling actions.

sections.title: Defensive Parry (Ex) (Swordlord)
sections.description: Grants +1 dodge bonus to AC when making full attack with dueling sword, increasing to +2 at 7th level. Stacks with fighter defender archetype levels.

sections.title: Adaptive Tactics (Ex) (Swordlord)
sections.description: Reduces attack penalties for fighting defensively and Combat Expertise by 1-2. After attacking same target, swift action Sense Motive check grants +2 circumstance bonus to attack or AC.

sections.title: Shatter Confidence (Ex) (Swordlord)
sections.description: Swift action Intimidate to demoralize after critical hit or successful combat maneuvers. Suppresses target's morale bonuses for multiple rounds, including barbarian rage bonuses.

sections.title: Saving Slash (Ex) (Swordlord)
sections.description: Immediate action to deflect melee critical hits with 25% chance of reducing to normal hit damage. Does not stack with fortification.

sections.title: Dexterous Duelist (Ex) (Swordlord)
sections.description: With free hand, retains Dexterity bonus to Acrobatics and Climb checks, and doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity when standing from prone.

sections.title: Greater Saving Slash (Swordlord)
sections.description: Improves saving slash to 50% chance against melee critical hits and adds 25% chance against ranged critical hits including rays and touch effects.

sections.title: Confounding Duelist (Ex) (Swordlord)
sections.description: When successfully using shatter confidence, also suppresses the target's competence and insight bonuses in addition to morale bonuses.
